targets.query: SELECT mean("$gpu_fields") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "index" fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "uptime_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(first(bytes_recv), 1s) as "download bytes/sec", derivative(first(bytes_sent), 1s) as "upload bytes/sec" FROM net WHERE time > now() - 1h AND interface != 'all' GROUP BY time(10s), interface fill(0);

SELECT derivative(first(bytes_recv), 1s) as "download bytes/sec", derivative(first(bytes_sent), 1s) as "upload bytes/sec" FROM net WHERE time > now() - 1h AND interface != 'all' GROUP BY time(10s), interface fill(0);

list.definition: SHOW TAG values from disk WITH KEY = "device"
list.name: disk_name
list.query: SHOW TAG values from disk WITH KEY = "device"
